title: Social Studies Module for Strengthening Fidelity in Flipped Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Applying a flipped learning model to effectively deliver social studies content in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Requires establishing a formative assessment-focused feedback system

learning_goals: Learners apply the four core principles of flipped learning (F-L-I-P™) to actual classroom instruction.
Learners achieve over 80% participation in learning activities in mobile environments using self-directed learning strategies.
Learners master over 90% of learning content through peer feedback and formative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
